_sText:
The map does not have many levels, but it's nice to play.

On the map, it also contains 3 not large bonus levels.

At the end of the map, there is a musical accompaniment (BeatBox Sound) with a trigger attached to the player, and the other players that are next to it will hear the sound.

Design and textures on the map (Lego Design) look good and will not be nervous.

I want to note that I did not have a map for 1 day from scratch)

I really hope that you will enjoy playing on my map!

Have a good game!
